network.server

Class ServerConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • network.server.ServerConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ServerConnection
extends java.lang.Thread
    Represents a thread on the server-side which handles the communication with a single client.
    Author:
    Christoph Hermann
    See Also:
    ClientConnection

      • ServerConnection

        public ServerConnection(java.net.Socket socket,
                        java.util.List<ServerConnection> clients,
                        ServerController serverController)
        Creates a new server thread communicating with a user.
        Parameters:
        socket - the socket on the user's end.
        clients - a list of all ServerThreads.
        serverController - the ServerController handling all messages received from the client.
